Ingredients.4: 1 (6 ounce) package white chocolate chips (such as Nestle®)

Directions.1: Line a baking sheet with waxed paper.

Directions.2: Mix cream cheese, peanut butter, and sugar together in a bowl; form into 1-inch balls.

Directions.3: Melt white chocolate chips in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes.

Directions.4: Dip each ball into the melted white chocolate, using spoons to roll ball around until evenly coated. Arrange coated balls on the prepared baking sheet; refrigerate until set, about 30 minutes.
